title: Jānis Krūmiņš (footballer)
text:
Janis Krūmiņš (born January 9, 1992) is a <a href="Latvia">Latvia</a>n professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player who last played for <a href="FC%20Yerevan">FC Yerevan</a> in the <a href="Armenian%20First%20League">Armenian First League</a>.
Career.
In 2019, Krūmiņš joined <a href="FC%20Yerevan">FC Yerevan</a>. On 21 February 2020, the <a href="Football%20Federation%20of%20Armenia">Football Federation of Armenia</a> announced that <a href="FC%20Yerevan">FC Yerevan</a> had withdrawn from the league due to financial and technical problems.
